com.uk.tsl.rfid.asciiprotocol.commands

Interface IAsciiCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbortCommand, AlertCommand, AsciiSelfResponderCommandBase, BarcodeCommand, BatteryStatusCommand, DateCommand, DateTimeCommand, ExecuteAutorunFileCommand, FactoryDefaultsCommand, InventoryCommand, KillCommand, LicenceKeyCommand, LockCommand, ReadAutorunFileCommand, ReadLogFileCommand, ReadTransponderCommand, SleepCommand, SleepTimeoutCommand, SwitchActionCommand, SwitchDoublePressCommand, SwitchDoublePressUserActionCommand, SwitchPressCommand, SwitchPressUserActionCommand, SwitchSinglePressCommand, SwitchSinglePressUserActionCommand, SwitchStateCommand, TimeCommand, TransponderMemoryCommandBase, TransponderSelectCommand, VersionInformationCommand, WriteAutorunFileCommand, WriteSingleTransponderCommand, WriteTransponderCommand

    public interface IAsciiCommand
    Defines an ASCII command that can be performed on any device supporting the TSL ASCII 2.0 Protocol A TSLAsciiCommand can be executed using any object that implements the TSLAsciiCommandExecuting protocol. The command can be executed either asynchronously or synchronously (by setting synchronousCommandResponder prior to execution). Synchronous commands prevent the issue of subsequent commands until the command’s response has been received.
